name: Machine Learning Final Project
body:
Welcome to the website of the our Machine Learning Project :smile:

# **Joint Sentiment Prediction via Review Text and Social Network Analysis**
## Data Processing
* Yelp Dataset Challenge
* Comprises 42,153 businesses, 320,002 business attributes,
31,617 check-in sets, 252,898 users, 403,210 tips, 1,125,458
reviews, as well as a social network consisting of 955,999 edges.
* Focus on businesses with enough ratings among Scottsdale,
Tempe, and Phoenix
* We would consider 4-star and 5-star rating as positive, while
1-star and 2-star rating as negative.

![Usercounts](images/uzcounts.png?raw=true) 

![Bizcounts](images/bizcounts.png?raw=true)
